title: Implementation of Monaragala-Buttala Water Supply Project through Belgium Funding
decision_details: this Water Supply Project will provide pipe borne water to about 50,000 consumers including commercial and industrial sectors in Monaragala and Buttala towns and suburban areas. The proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above contract and to request the Department of External Resources to seek foreign and local funding for the purpose, was approved by the Cabinet.
